description: One of the first Wear Native Apps make it in the world. Download NOW for FREE!!!ATTENTION - Instalation process:-Wait for app to install-Wait between 30sec and 2min in order to get installed on your Wear DeviceNEW: Change the color of your CalculatorNEW: Open app from Mobile [Wear icon]NEW: Get results on your phone to copy/shareNEW: Supports all screens [Square & Round]Emails us to improve this app and/or to request new functions.
descriptionHTML:
One of the first Wear Native Apps make it in the world. Download NOW for FREE!!!

ATTENTION - Instalation process:

-Wait for app to install
-Wait between 30sec and 2min in order to get installed on your Wear Device

NEW: Change the color of your Calculator
NEW: Open app from Mobile [Wear icon]
NEW: Get results on your phone to copy/share
NEW: Supports all screens [Square & Round]

Emails us to improve this app and/or to request new functions.
comments: Most stupid calculator It uses battery by making unuseful vibration. What a stupid app with no feature
Works on moto360 now Works fine now. Interface is a little basic and numbers are small as is wasted screen space.
Disappointed Wont load on galaxy gear. Pick the color and it just sits there.
Lg g watch Color theme are good. Very basic. Clean layout
Works Developers corrected crash issue, it's a handy calculator to have. At the end of the day it's a calculator and it does what it should.
Working nicely on 360 now, useful. Thanks!
recentChanges: First Calculator for Wear and Material Design
Get resutls on phone screen to copy the content.
Get fancy with new colors in your wear device
